person.note: Sun(1) B [13295] For the history of this lineage, see Lou Yue, WJ, 96.15a-26a and Zhou Bida, WJ, 74.3b-7b. The ancestors were Nan Lanling jun people. This commandary was created when Xiao(1) Zheng [12250] moved here during the Western-Eastern Jin transition and abolished by the Southern Qi. I am assuming that the ancestor was employed in the service of the Xiao(1) and am using this as a Sun(1) choronym even though it is not listed anywhere. During the Five dynasty troubles, presumably early when Yang(2) Xingmi [4044] established the short-lived kindom of Wu, an ancestor moved to Jizhou, Taihe county (Sun(1) C [13296]). Wen's [13298] grandfather, Debi [13297], and fifth generation ancestor of Fengji [13303] and Fengchen [13307] moved on basis of father's instructions to Longquan (modern Suichuan) county.
